Text: Re Gathering Company Repsinclude Rusty Belflower in all future correspondence

EPCOE Contractsuse the attached as gobys Forwarded by Nick CocavessisCorpEnron on AM Scott NRONDEVELOPMENT PM To Nick NRON cc Brian CT Subject EPCOE Contracts Forgot to copy Nick Forwarded by Scott DieballENRONDEVELOPMENT on PM Scott Dieball PM To Brian CT cc Subject EPCOE Contracts Not much luck thus far Both of my pipelineprocess contracting guys are gone for the day Ill talked to them on Monday In the meantime attached are sample forms for the following Owners Engineer Agreement this form was put together for the Vitro power project but the type of project wont really make a difference in most respects EPC Term Sheet this form was taken from the RioGen power project so some of the terms will probably not be applicable such as performance LD provisions I can send you an EPC contract goby for power projects but I think many of the provisions will be overkill or otherwise not applicable Let me know if you want it otherwise Ill see what I can find on Monday re an EPC contract and EPC termsheet for pipelineprocess projects Regards Scott

Re WildhorseTom Brown Acquisition Cc audreyo be coordinating the infrastructure due diligence with the appropriate members of our engineering team and WildhorseTom Brown once she determines the extent of available information Mark Whitt PM Sent by Mark Whitt To Arvel CT Audrey O CT Becky CT Christopher K CT Don CT Gerald CT Joan CT Mark NRON Mark nron Nick NRON Rusty nron Scott NRON Teresa G CT Walt D CT Brian CT Barbara N CT Ken ENRON cc Subject WildhorseTom Brown Acquisition I spoke with Bob Mustard of Tom Brown today and we are going to get access to the Wildhorse information on Wed Nov at MST in the Kinder Morgan offices We will have until Christmas to agree on a value for the assets we have an interest in acquiring Tom Brown plans to have a Data Room open Jan to sell all of their Pieceance and Uintah gathering assets If we have agreed on a value for this system by Christmas then they will not include these assets in that Data Room Lets discuss the particulars in the Tues morning meeting tommorow Mark

Re FW Enron rate sheet Cc I appreciate the brevity of the revised rate sheet I marked it up to reflect our desired changes I also requested our Attorney Gerald Nemec prepare the Professional Services Agreement so we can begin utilizing your resources Please note a Tasking Letter describing the scope of work and estimating the cost will be required prior to PCS performing the work Thanks Nick
PCS Tasking Letter Cc Please note the attached is the scope of work PCS is to complete as their first deliverable to ENA under the proposed PSA Thanks Nick
Services Cc the attached scope of work and provide an estimate for the services requested I would appreciate this estimate today We will have the PSA to you for your signature first thing tomorrow
Re PCS Pro Services Agreementmade one minor change

PSA for IntecPlease prepare a draft of a PSA for Intec Engineering They provide engineering procurement and project management services to the offshore industry and specialize in pipelines and terminals You can use the one you prepared for PCS as the basis I am negotiating the unit rate attachment Thanks Nick

Re PCS Pro Services Agreementmade one minor change
Services Cc the attached scope of work and provide an estimate for the services requested I would appreciate this estimate today We will have the PSA to you for your signature first thing tomorrow
PCS Tasking Letter Cc Please note the attached is the scope of work PCS is to complete as their first deliverable to ENA under the proposed PSA Thanks Nick
